import React, { useState } from "react"; function WeekDay(props){ let weekDay = new Date().getDay() console.log(weekDay) console.log(props.dayName) console.log(props.dayName[weekDay]); return ( <>
{props.dayName[props.weekDay%7]}{props.rate}
{props.dayName[(props.weekDay+1)%7]}{props.rate}
); } export default WeekDay;
